About Me:

I am a student as The University of Colorado Boulder pursuing a Computer Science B.S. Originally from Washington state, I am mainly interested in software developement but have recently joined the robotics club and have been exploring that field as well. I like to spend my free time either drawing, tending to my plants, or playing video games. Feel free to check out my résumé or email me at paytonhsu@outlook.com!
